PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03922022-04-25,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActInquiries Act
SubjectPublic Inquiry into the 2022 Public Order Emergency
PrecisOrder (1) directing that a COMMISSION be established and that the Honourable Paul S. Rouleau be appointed a Commissioner to conduct an inquiry under the name of the PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO THE 2022 PUBLIC ORDER EMERGENCY for the period ending on March 31, 2023; and (2) requiring that the report of the Public Inquiry into the 2022 Public Order Emergency be laid before each House of Parliament by February 20, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
